name: v2.0.1
body:
- Fix presubmit issues since [2.0.0](https://github.com/vimana-cloud/rules_wasm/releases/tag/v2.0.0).
- Add script to update Bzlmod dependencies.
- Bump dependencies.

name: v2.0.0
body:
New features:
- Add hacky support for C components.
- Add hacky support for Go components.

Breaking changes:
- WIT packages now require an explicit package name attribute.
- WIT packages can no longer be single source files.
- Regressed to WASI 0.2.0 since that's the only version currently supported by TinyGo.
- Moved `<language>.bzl` to `<language>/defs.bzl`

name: v1.1.1
body: - Bug fix related to distribution.

name: v1.1.0
body: - Add basic support for C components, although it should really be re-written as a proper CC toolchain.

name: v1.0.17
body: - Address https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel-central-registry/issues/3260.

name: v1.0.16
body: - Download a version of [`wac`](https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wac/issues/142) with static libc.

name: v1.0.15
body: - Fifteenth time's the charm for release automation. See https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel-central-registry/pull/2969#discussion_r1804433549.

name: v1.0.14
body: - No changes since 1.0.13, but hopefully release automation will work now since https://github.com/bazel-contrib/publish-to-bcr/pull/172 was deployed.

name: v1.0.13
body:
- Faithful testing with Bzlmod.
- BCR release workflow should work now: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/publish-to-bcr/pull/170.

name: v1.0.12
body: - Another shot at automating releases to the BCR.

name: v1.0.11
body: Another attempt at BCR automation.

name: v1.0.10
body: Another attempt

name: v1.0.9
body: - More tweaking the workflow.

name: v1.0.8
body: - Try again to fix that workflow.

name: v1.0.7
body: - Try to fix release workflow.

name: v1.0.6
body: - Try to fix release workflow.

name: v1.0.5
body: - Fix release asset workflow.

name: v1.0.4
body: - Add explicit release artifact.

name: v1.0.3
body: - Try to fix BCR automation.

name: v1.0.2
body: - Publish to the BCR automatically on release.

name: v1.0.1
body:
- Package WIT files with transitive dependencies.
- Bump dependencies.

name: v1.0.0
body:
- Compatible with Mac (tested in CI).
- Added support for simple composition.

name: v0.1.3
body: Make it more resistant to name conflicts.

name: v0.1.2
body: Fix platforms dependency.

name: v0.1.1
body: Fix issue importing module as dependency.

name: v0.1.0
body: MVP
